title: Depeche Mode - Violator SACD 24-88.2kHz [FLAC]
description:
Depeche Mode - Violator SACD 24-88.2kHz [FLAC]


Converted from DSF to FLAC with DSDMaster

When converting DSD audio, there's a lot of noise above 30kHz (DSD64) noise-shaped 1-bit quantization and dither results in substantial ultrasonic noise which is fundamental to all DSD mastered recordings, so when converting to FLAC the converter needs to go through a lowpass filter. DSDMaster does this beutifully. You don't need to heat up your tweeters with a lot of noise now, do you? :-)

Crank up the volume to 11 and enjoy!

Scaling Factor: 5.11 dB
